title: Implement get-song command
description: Add a `get-song` command to the CLI that accepts a video ID and prints the song metadata using `ytmusicapi.get_song`.

title: Refine get-song with SongDetails dataclass
description: Create a SongDetails dataclass (title, artist, album, videoId, length). Update logic to parse ytmusicapi response into this class, handling album extraction logic.

title: Implement CLI entry point
description: Create a CLI entry point for the utilities using argparse. It should support a login command and a version command.

title: Implement playlist conversion command
description: Add a `convert-playlist` command. It should read a CSV in the format of `docs/example-playlist.csv`, look up song details for each Video Id using the Client, and write a new CSV preserving the playlist header but updating the song columns to VideoId, Title, Artist, Album.

title: Add Python type checking
description: Add mypy for static type checking, configure it in pyproject.toml, and ensure the codebase passes type checks.

title: Update README with usage instructions
description: Update README.md to include installation steps (uv), usage of the ym-utils CLI, and basic library usage example.

title: Create a python development environment for this project.
Install necessary tools such as ruff for the project.
Modify Client to only create unauthenticated YTMusic instance
description: Adjust the Client class in `src/youtube_music_utils/client.py` to always initialize an unauthenticated `ytmusicapi.YTMusic` instance, ignoring any `auth` path provided. Remove the `login` method.

title: Implement get-song-raw command
description: Add a `get-song-raw` command to the CLI. It should act like `get-song` but print the raw JSON response from `ytmusicapi.get_song` instead of parsing it into a `SongDetails` object.

title: Bug: CLI login should not strictly require credentials if auth file exists
description: The `login` command currently enforces required --client-id and --client-secret arguments. It should allow omitting them if the target authentication file already exists, in which case it should attempt to verify/use the existing session.

title: Implement YouTube Music Client Wrapper
description: Create a class in src/youtube_music_utils that initializes ytmusicapi.YTMusic and handles authentication gracefully.
